title: Armagh PATT travel grant
abstractText:
Astronomers at Armagh Observatory carry out a diverse range of research, including studies of pulsating stars, accreting binary systems, high and low mass stars. This entails travelling overseas 
to use world class telescopes. The aim of this proposal is to ensure funding for travel and subsistence so that astronomers can carry out their observations.
findingsText: Advances in astrophysics. Further research. Other
